channel.title: Mobile Device Section
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt] Mobile Devices Section[/size][/center]
[center][size=10pt]This section would obviously be for posting anything that has to do with any sort of mobile device such as iPhones, Androids, Kindles, Tablets, iPads, Jailbreaking, etc..[/size] [size=10pt]Im sure a mass majoirty of this community has some sort of Mobile Device so this could be a useful section on the forums, but then I am sure people probably think its pretty stupid. I was then thinking if this suggestion was popular and well supported then I suggest a possible badge for this section for users who are very knowledgebale in the Mobile Device Industry or if they are great in developing Applications or Jailbreak Tweaks![/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt] Purposes of Section[/size] [size=10pt] [ul][li]Any sort of discussions regarding any sort of Mobile Device[/li] [li]Troubleshooting[/li] [li]Jailbreaking[/li] [li]Application Development/Tweak Development[/li] [li]Tutorials[/li][/ul] [/center]

item.title: Mobile Device Section
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:4, topic:538071”]We have a general programming section that suits the needs of a application development board, and it doesn’t get a lot of attention as it is. As for troubleshooting, we have a general questions board.
Overall, I can’t see there being nearly enough interest to warrant the introduction of a mobile devices board. I’ve seen maybe 2-3 threads in the past month pertaining to jailbreaking or mobile phones as a general topic.[/quote]

Yeah that seems to be true but I was just giving it a shot lol. And those posts were probably all mine

Read full topic

item.title: Mobile Device Section
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

We have a general programming section that suits the needs of a application development board, and it doesn’t get a lot of attention as it is. As for troubleshooting, we have a general questions board.
Overall, I can’t see there being nearly enough interest to warrant the introduction of a mobile devices board. I’ve seen maybe 2-3 threads in the past month pertaining to jailbreaking or mobile phones as a general topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Mobile Device Section

item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

Davidi2:

Gunna have to give the big en-oh to that one. Don’t see enough posts at all to justify one.

[center][size=16pt] Mobile Devices Section[/size][/center]

[center][size=10pt]This section would obviously be for posting anything that has to do with any sort of mobile device such as iPhones, Androids, Kindles, Tablets, iPads, Jailbreaking, etc…[/size]
[size=10pt]Im sure a mass majoirty of this community has some sort of Mobile Device so this could be a useful section on the forums, but then I am sure people probably think its pretty stupid. I was then thinking if this suggestion was popular and well supported then I suggest a possible badge for this section for users who are very knowledgebale in the Mobile Device Industry or if they are great in developing Applications or Jailbreak Tweaks![/size][/center]

[ul][li]Any sort of discussions regarding any sort of Mobile Device[/li]
